What We Offer

Our Services

We provide comprehensive ship chandling and marine engineering solutions, offering high-quality marine supplies, technical services, and logistics support to vessels worldwide.

With over two decades of experience in the maritime industry, we take pride in delivering excellence through our comprehensive range of services. Our global network and commitment to quality ensure that your vessel receives the best support, whenever and wherever needed.

Explore Service

Engine Stores

Premium selection of engine maintenance supplies including asbestos-free packing, lubricants, welding equipment, and specialized tools for marine engineering applications.

Explore Service

Deck Stores

Comprehensive range of deck equipment including PPE, hoses, valves, pipes, charts, and GMDSS equipment. Specialized in high-quality marine-grade products meeting international standards.

Explore Service

Provision Stores

Fresh and frozen food supplies catering to international crews, including premium quality meats, vegetables, dairy products, and dry stores with long shelf life.

Explore Service

Marine Equipments

Professional-grade marine tools including pneumatic equipment, specialized cutting tools, certified non-sparking tools, and comprehensive hardware solutions. We supply high-quality marine equipment meeting international safety standards, along with technical support and maintenance guidance for optimal performance.

Explore Service

Cabin Stores

Our Cabin Stores include the full range of different types of clothing including chemical products, stationary, medicines and medical equipment, cloth and linen, tableware and galley utensils, brushes and mats and lavatory products.

Alcanza Ship Services has 30 years of experience in ship supply and spare parts. We provide new-built stores to shipyards and technical stores to ports and the offshore oil & gas sector. Recently, we expanded to supply cruise liners, prioritizing the health and safety of seafarers on all vessels we serve.
